tit.e: Kurio-toge Pass (a pass on a national route in Keihoku-hosono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Kurio-toge Pass (a pass on a national route in Keihoku-hosono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)

sen.j: 栗尾峠（くりおとうげ）は京都府京都市右京区京北細野町にある国道上の峠である。
sen.e: Kurio Pass is on a national route in Kehoku-hosono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kurio-toge Pass is a pass on a national route in Kehoku-hosono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kurio-toge Pass is a pass on a national route in Kehoku-hosono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 標高421mの国道162号上に位置する峠である。
sen.e: Kurio pass is located on National Route 162, and is 421m high.
It is located on National Route 162 at an altitude of 421 meters.
It is located on National Route 162 at an altitude of 421 meters.

sen.j: 京都府と福井県を結ぶ街道である周山街道上の難所である。
sen.e: This grueling pass is on the Shuzan-kaido Road, which connects Kyoto Prefecture and Fukui Prefecture.
This pass is a chokepoint on the Shuzan-kaido Road, which connects Kyoto Prefecture and Fukui Prefecture.
This pass is a chokepoint on the Shuzan-kaido Road, which connects Kyoto Prefecture and Fukui Prefecture.

sen.j: 現在の国道162号の道中の400m級の峠において、トンネルが掘削されていない唯一の峠である。
sen.e: Amongst the passes around 400m high on the current National Route 162, Kurio Pass is the only one which doesn't have a tunnel.
Amongst the passes around 400 meter high on the current National Route 162, Kurio-toge Pass is the only one which doesn't have a tunnel.
Amongst the passes around 400 meter high on the current National Route 162, Kurio-toge Pass is the only one which doesn't have a tunnel.

sen.j: 現在直下にトンネルを掘削し、栗尾バイパスを整備しようとする声が広まっている。
sen.e: There is now increasing demand to drill a tunnel directly under the pass and build Kurio Bypass.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: There is now increasing demand to drill a tunnel directly under the pass and build Kurio Bypass.
There is now increasing demand to drill a tunnel directly under the pass and build Kurio Bypass.

sen.j: 実際に調査を行い用地買収にも着手している段階にある。
sen.e: Indeed, the plan has reached the stage of surveying the area and the acquisition of land has begun.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Indeed, the plan has reached the stage of surveying the area and the acquisition of land has begun.
Indeed, the plan has reached the stage of surveying the area and the acquisition of land has begun.

sen.j: 完成すれば国道162号上の笠峠、堀越峠、深見峠などとともにトンネル峠となるであろう峠である。
sen.e: Once completed, it will become another pass with a tunnel on National Route 162 like Kasa Pass, Horikoshi Pass and Fukami Pass.
Once completed, it will become another pass with a tunnel on National Route 162 such as Kasa-toge Pass, Horikoshi-toge Pass and Fukami-toge Pass.
Once completed, it will become another pass with a tunnel on National Route 162 such as Kasa-toge Pass, Horikoshi-toge Pass and Fukami-toge Pass.

sen.j: 国道上の峠であり、車両での通行が可能な峠である。
sen.e: Vehicles can use Kurio Pass as it is on a national route.
Vehicles can use Kurio-toge Pass as it is on a national route.
Vehicles can use Kurio-toge Pass as it is on a national route.

sen.j: 国道162号は京都市と若狭湾を繋ぐ幹線道路である為、貨物自動車などの大型車両、牽引車両の通行が多い。
sen.e: As National Route 162 is a main road connecting Kyoto City and Wakasa Bay, there is heavy traffic with large vehicles including freight and trailer vehicles.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: As National Route 162 is a main road connecting Kyoto City and Wakasa Bay, there is heavy traffic with large vehicles including freight and trailer vehicles.
As National Route 162 is a main road connecting Kyoto City and Wakasa Bay, there is heavy traffic with large vehicles including freight and trailer vehicles.

sen.j: また京都市内である為、観光客などの一般車両の通行も多い。
sen.e: The road is also heavily used by tourists and other car users because it goes through Kyoto city center.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The road is also heavily used by tourists and other car users because it goes through Kyoto City center.
The road is also heavily used by tourists and other car users because it goes through Kyoto City center.

sen.j: 道路としては片側1車線が確保されているが、急勾配、急カーブの連続する区間であり、上記のバイパスの建設が急務となっている。
sen.e: The road over the pass has one lane in each direction, but because it has continuous steep slopes and tight curves it is imperative to build Kurio Bypass (as mentioned above).
The road over the pass is double lane, but because it has continuous steep slopes and tight curves it is imperative to build the bypass mentioned above.
The road over the pass is double lane, but because it has continuous steep slopes and tight curves it is imperative to build the bypass mentioned above.

sen.j: この栗尾バイパスは平成26年度供用開始予定である。
sen.e: Kurio Bypass is scheduled to open in 2014.
Kurio Bypass is scheduled to open in 2014.
Kurio Bypass is scheduled to open in 2014.
Kasa Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Kasa-toge Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Kasa-toge Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City)

sen.j: 深見峠（京都市右京区・南丹市）
sen.e: Fukami Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Nantan City)
Fukami-toge Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Nantan City)
Fukami-toge Pass (Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Nantan City)
